label: specifiedProductBatchCertification
comment: A product batch certification specified for this production facility.
A product batch certification specified for this production process.

rangeIncludes.comment: The process of certifying that a certain product batch has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.

domainIncludes.comment: A man made physical structure, such as a building, in which something is produced.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
